events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but I want to return it because it doesn't fit properly and request a refund.
The customer's request for a return and refund has been categorized under the Refund cluster for processing.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request concerning the jacket return.
Hello! I'm here to assist you with your return and refund. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund efficiently, may I know if the jacket has been worn or washed, and do you still have the tags intact?
I have the order number 12345XYZ, the jacket is unworn, and the tags are still attached exactly as when delivered.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket via our prepaid shipping label, and once we receive it, a full refund will be issued to your original payment method.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today using the prepaid label.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your full refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear on your account.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Thank you for your confirmation. We are closing this refund case now. We look forward to serving you again in the future.
